entries.HarveyPlus.8Hearts: @,^^I'm sorry that I was so frazzled yesterday. I don't get many visitors, so when you stopped by it was a surprise.^^Not a bad one! Just unexpected.^^Anyway... I was reorganizing my desk and found this. I thought you might like to have it. If you ever want to listen to the planes go by, you can tune it to frequency 140.^^- Harvey%item furniture RetroRadio%%[#]A Gift From Harvey
